name: Merchant Guard
description:
This is a page for downloading tech demo, in the future there will be a full-fledged game.

Control:
- Left Click - spawn unit for Red team;
- Right Click - spawn unit for Blue team;
- R - restart.

Also:
Over time, this demo will be supplemented.
The tech demo just demonstrates the behavior of AI in the game, that's all.
If you want, you can buy the product now, in the future (in the next couple of months) the game will be ready, it will not be very big game.

You can follow the development: Twitter | Reddit
